channel.title: Regnum online -- Linux game
channel.description:
i was looking for a new game to play, and i found this, Regnum online, i knew that they're weren many mmorpg's that were compatible with linuxx, so i decided to post it.
the website is www.regnumonlne.com.ar
[i][b]Screenshots:[/b][/i]
[img]http://download04.powerchallenge.com/regnum/images/gallery/screenshots/crystals_me.jpg[/img]
[img]http://download04.powerchallenge.com/regnum/images/gallery/screenshots/coliseo_me.jpg[/img]
[img]http://download04.powerchallenge.com/regnum/images/gallery/screenshots/coliseo2_me.jpg[/img]
Yes i know, the graphics are kinda crappy and look like runescape, but they're arent that many games for linux users, so i figured id post it.
EDIT: a few videos of gameplay
http://youtube.com/watch?v=pg7EoGzEEu4
http://youtube.com/watch?v=YUp4Nh2uT7U
http://youtube.com/watch?v=KZfG8FxXeac

item.title: Regnum online -- Linux game
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Indeed, MUD’s are amazing. Right now i’m hooked to Ultima Online (once again). You can’t find more role-playing entertainment anywhere

i meant the way the characters look, the enviorment looks so much better than runescapes

@Speljohan wrote:

Interesting… Rectum Online. Too bad i can’t stand today’s mmorpg’s. I’m an old-school role player

item.title: Regnum online -- Linux game
item.dc:creator: @sicarius99 sicarius99
item.description:
@sicarius99 wrote:

lmao those graphics are 10x better then runescapes…
I’m going to check the game out though.

item.title: Regnum online -- Linux game
item.dc:creator: @KryptoN KryptoN_
item.description:
@KryptoN wrote:

Yea, it’s pretty fun. Me and frankypoo used to play it, however it got quite boring just fighting and there were so many bugs in the client. Also, my computer could barely handle it, but it is a good game, nonetheless!

Btw, how are those graphics crappy? They are much more spectacular and complex than Runescape…

Btw again, you got a typo in the URL :p.

http://www.regnumonline.com.ar/

Read full topic
